attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Sexual Orientation Regualtions should not be allowed to pass as law as they are. They interfere with the rights and beliefs of Christians and other religious  faiths. God is a God of Love, He forces noone and as created beings we are endowed with dignity and a freedom of choice and have the right to relate to God according to the dictates of conscience.
